price: “Kandi nikinze kuri Nyagasani wanjye ari na We Nyagasani wanyu, kugira ngo mutantera amabuye.”
arabic: وَإِنِّي عُذۡتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمۡ أَن تَرۡجُمُونِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-innī ʿudh'tu birabbī warabbikum an tarjumūni
